menuItems.title: Classic Burger
menuItems.description: A classic beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
menuItems.recipe: Grill beef patty, toast the bun, add lettuce, tomato, cheese, and assemble.

menuItems.title: Veggie Pizza
menuItems.description: A pizza topped with bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives.
menuItems.recipe: Prepare pizza dough, spread tomato sauce, add cheese, top with veggies, and bake.

menuItems.title: Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Crispy romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
menuItems.recipe: Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, top with croutons and Parmesan.

menuItems.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
menuItems.description: Traditional spaghetti served with a rich Bolognese sauce.
menuItems.recipe: Cook spaghetti, prepare Bolognese sauce with ground beef and tomatoes, and combine.

menuItems.title: Chicken Tacos
menuItems.description: Tacos filled with grilled chicken, avocado, and salsa.
menuItems.recipe: Grill chicken, prepare salsa, assemble tacos with chicken, avocado, and salsa.

menuItems.title: Margarita Pizza
menuItems.description: A simple pizza topped with fresh basil, tomatoes, and mozzarella.
menuItems.recipe: Prepare pizza dough, spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella, and fresh basil, then bake.

menuItems.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
menuItems.description: A delicious grilled cheese sandwich with melted cheddar.
menuItems.recipe: Butter bread slices, add cheese, and grill until golden brown and cheese is melted.

menuItems.title: Beef Stroganoff
menuItems.description: Tender beef strips in a creamy mushroom sauce.
menuItems.recipe: Cook beef strips, prepare mushroom sauce with cream, and combine with beef.

menuItems.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
menuItems.description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with grilled chicken.
menuItems.recipe: Cook pasta, prepare Alfredo sauce with cream and Parmesan, add grilled chicken.

menuItems.title: Greek Salad
menuItems.description: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
menuItems.recipe: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese, and toss with olive oil and herbs.

menuItems.title: Shrimp Tacos
menuItems.description: Tacos filled with spicy shrimp, avocado, and cilantro lime sauce.
menuItems.recipe: Cook shrimp with spices, prepare cilantro lime sauce, and assemble tacos.

menuItems.title: BBQ Ribs
menuItems.description: Tender pork ribs coated in BBQ sauce and grilled to perfection.
menuItems.recipe: Marinate ribs in BBQ sauce, grill until tender and caramelized.

menuItems.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
menuItems.description: A mix of vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and garlic.
menuItems.recipe: Stir-fry vegetables with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.

menuItems.title: Lemon Bars
menuItems.description: Tangy lemon bars with a sweet, buttery crust.
menuItems.recipe: Prepare a buttery crust, mix lemon filling, bake and cool.

menuItems.title: Chocolate Cake
menuItems.description: Rich chocolate cake with a moist texture and chocolate frosting.
menuItems.recipe: Mix ingredients for cake, bake, and frost with chocolate icing.
